extension.description:
Ultimate Google AdSense Plugin By Internet Partner

Ultimage Google AdSense Plugin By Internet Partner is a plugin which adds a Google AdSense on your web page.
More then that, you can set it up to prevent click on your own Google AdSense advertisements with IP Block.

More information on internetpartner.info
